description: ff. 71. 201 x 148; 158 x 100 mm. 25 lin. maghribi. 17th cent. Brockelmann, GAL, II, 636; S II, 731 (Kitāb al-falākah wa-al-maflūkīn) - the title Tasliyat al-udabāʼ appears on fol. 1a. Incip.: ... الحمد لمن ىستحق الحمد لذاته ... وبعد فقد منحتکم ىا معشر اخوانى
author: Daljī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī, 1368?-1434 or 1435
title: Tasliyat al-udabāʼ wa-uswat al-fuqarāʼ fī man taqaddamatʹhu al-falākah min al-kubarāʼ.
creator: Daljī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī, 1368?-1434 or 1435
subject: Poverty—Religious aspects—Islam—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
